posts.title: BestRoomies-The Thought
posts.text: What is the thought behind bestroomies? Life is like a game of Cricket. We all have targets to achieve , for us to get materialistic and spiritual Happiness. This span between ages 20-30 years of our life , are like our lifeâ€™s slog overs ,where we can focus on our Career and build great friendships. BestRoomies attempts to help you find Roommates who have similar goals as You , and also find a good accommodation to live at , in order to reach your goals collectively. Why do you need Facebook Login for Roomies? Facebook SignUp helps us provide you only genuine leads .Facebook has strong algorithm which helps sort the genuine people .Facebook Signup also makes filling in information at Dashboard /Profile easy What about my Privacy ? Is my Data Safe We save your information in latest and advanced data storage databases , which are encrypted .Bestroomies (C/o Improov Technologies take sole responsibilty and liabilty that we will not share your information to any third party Organizations) Are there any charges to use bestroomies? No, currently we are not charging any of our Users I am Looking for a Room near my office ,How do i find it? Click on SignUp to Bestroomies and Select I am Looking Room . When you enter You can select 3 Neighborhoods you would like to move in and also the amenties . You can view all matched listings as well as unmatched listings .You can then shortlist based on your liking and do Video Chat with your next roomies / landlord to break the ice :). Are broker owned Properties listed ? No , We promote No brokerage properties where Genuine Tenants and Genuine Landlords interact to create seamless renting experience I am Landlord having multiple Properties , How do i list? After Listing your most urgent property to be listed , You can add your next property.

posts.title: Hello World
posts.text: Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub. Quick StartCreate a new post1$ hexo new "My New Post" More info: Writing Run server1$ hexo server More info: Server Generate static files1$ hexo generate More info: Generating Deploy to remote sites1$ hexo deploy More info: Deployment
